name: tailwind-html-includes
description: A simple Tailwind CSS + HTML Includes builder

scripts.build: npm run make_dist && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/_tailwind.css -o ./src/_styles.css --minify && html-includes --src src --dest dist --minify minifyJS=true
scripts.serve: npm run make_dist ; sleep 1 && servor dist --reload --browse & npx tailwindcss -i ./src/_tailwind.css -o ./src/_styles.css --watch & html-includes --src src --dest dist --watch
